description: Try our easy to follow Broccolini with Lemon & Garlic recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Saut√©ed vegetable,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Lemon,Sesame free,Broccolini,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Broccolini with Lemon & Garlic Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a large skillet or pan, and stir fry broccolini and crushed garlic.
Lower heat, cover and cook for 7 to 10 minutes or until tender.
Stir in lemon juice and serve.
